channel.title: [PI] Magic Farcasting
channel.description: Whenever u try maging somebody , you run up to them .. like if ur barraging it runs up to the person . i wanna make it so u stay in the same spot so people can hybrid and far cast better.Anybody know how i can change this?

item.title: [PI] Magic Farcasting
item.dc:creator: @Jake2008 Jake2008
item.description:
@Jake2008 wrote:

combatassistant.java

if(c.spellId > 0) {
c.followDistance = 8;
}

probly got somthing wrong, but thats pretty much it. add to attackplayer method btw
